Contact Us

Contact Us
==========

How to Find Us
--------------

Palouse City Hall  
East 120 Main St  
P.O. Box 248   
Palouse, WA 99161  
[509-878-1811](tel:5098781811)

City Hall Hours  
Monday through Friday,  
9:00 am to 4:00 pm

[Phone Numbers & Quick Information](https://www.palousewa.gov/pages/about-our-town/)  
 [Make a Payment](https://www.palousewa.gov/make-a-payment/)

Comments are closed.

### Find Us

### Palouse City Hall

East 120 Main Street  
P.O Box 248  
Palouse, WA 99161

**City Hall Hours:**  
Monday through Friday,  
9:00 am to 4:00 pm
